messages.subject: Re: Re: Shaming in Schools
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/1/99 10:38:51 PM CST, jhawthorne@home.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/1/99 10:38:51 PM CST, jhawthorne@... writes:

<< Give me the name of this list. I've never been kicked off a list before
and it
sounds like it would be an honor. >>

LOLOL, Joel! I honestly don't remember the whole name of the list...I think I
had to join it to recieve some free stickers or something! Otherwise, I would
be more than happy to share it. There was, however, another homeschool mom
who made a comment about that particular thread also, though not as
inflammitory as mine! She stated she was going to leave that list. So, I do
not feel you are missing much.
Blessings, Lori in TX
